org.carrot2.mahout.math

Interface Matrix

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable, Iterable<MatrixSlice>, VectorIterable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMatrix, DenseMatrix, MatrixView

    public interface Matrix
extends Cloneable, VectorIterable
